location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

name.description: The name of the machine extension.

properties.description: Describes the properties of a Machine Extension.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.
Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.
Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

kind.description: Metadata used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type; e.g. ApiApps are a kind of Microsoft.Web/sites type.  If supported, the resource provider must validate and persist this value.

id.description: Gets the ARM Id of the microsoft.scvmm/availabilitySets resource.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the availability set.

vmmServerId.description: ARM Id of the vmmServer resource in which this resource resides.

parentCheckpointID.description: Gets ID of parent of the checkpoint.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the resource.

vmmServerId.description: ARM Id of the vmmServer resource in which this resource resides.

clientPublicKey.description: Gets or sets the Public Key provided by the client for enabling guest management.

credentials.description: Username / Password Credentials to connect to guest.

httpProxyConfig.description: HTTP Proxy configuration for the VM.

provisioningAction.description: Gets or sets the guest agent provisioning action.

password.description: Gets or sets the password to connect with the guest.

username.description: Gets or sets username to connect with the guest.

GuestCredential.description: Username / Password Credentials to connect to guest.

cpuCount.description: Gets or sets the number of vCPUs for the vm.

dynamicMemoryEnabled.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable dynamic memory or not.

dynamicMemoryMaxMB.description: Gets or sets the max dynamic memory for the vm.

dynamicMemoryMinMB.description: Gets or sets the min dynamic memory for the vm.

limitCpuForMigration.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable processor compatibility mode for live migration of VMs.

memoryMB.description: MemoryMB is the size of a virtual machine's memory, in MB.

HttpProxyConfiguration.description: HTTP Proxy configuration for the VM.

publicKey.description: Gets or sets the Public Key.

resourceUid.description: Gets or sets the Vm Id.

type.description: The type of managed service identity.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the resource.

inventoryItemName.description: Gets or sets the Managed Object name in VMM for the resource.

autoUpgradeMinorVersion.description: Indicates whether the extension should use a newer minor version if one is available at deployment time. Once deployed, however, the extension will not upgrade minor versions unless redeployed, even with this property set to true.

enableAutomaticUpgrade.description: Indicates whether the extension should be automatically upgraded by the platform if there is a newer version available.

forceUpdateTag.description: How the extension handler should be forced to update even if the extension configuration has not changed.

protectedSettings.description: The extension can contain either protectedSettings or protectedSettingsFromKeyVault or no protected settings at all.

publisher.description: The name of the extension handler publisher.

settings.description: Json formatted public settings for the extension.

type.description: Specifies the type of the extension; an example is "CustomScriptExtension".

typeHandlerVersion.description: Specifies the version of the script handler.

MachineExtensionProperties.description: Describes the properties of a Machine Extension.

ipv4AddressType.description: Gets or sets the ipv4 address type.

ipv6AddressType.description: Gets or sets the ipv6 address type.

macAddress.description: Gets or sets the nic MAC address.

macAddressType.description: Gets or sets the mac address type.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the network interface.

nicId.description: Gets or sets the nic id.

virtualNetworkId.description: Gets or sets the ARM Id of the Microsoft.ScVmm/virtualNetwork resource to connect the nic.

networkInterfaces.description: Gets or sets the list of network interfaces associated with the virtual machine.

adminPassword.description: Admin password of the virtual machine.

disks.description: Gets or sets the list of virtual disks associated with the virtual machine.

id.description: The ID of the QoS policy.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

SystemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

bus.description: Gets or sets the disk bus.

busType.description: Gets or sets the disk bus type.

createDiffDisk.description: Gets or sets a value indicating diff disk.

diskId.description: Gets or sets the disk id.

diskSizeGB.description: Gets or sets the disk total size.

lun.description: Gets or sets the disk lun.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the disk.

templateDiskId.description: Gets or sets the disk id in the template.

vhdType.description: Gets or sets the disk vhd type.

ipAddresses.description: Gets or sets the nic ip addresses.

checkpointType.description: Type of checkpoint supported for the vm.

cloudId.description: ARM Id of the cloud resource to use for deploying the vm.

generation.description: Gets or sets the generation for the vm.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the resource.

templateId.description: ARM Id of the template resource to use for deploying the vm.

uuid.description: Unique ID of the virtual machine.

vmmServerId.description: ARM Id of the vmmServer resource in which this resource resides.

vmName.description: VMName is the name of VM on the SCVMM server.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

name.description: The name of the machine extension.

properties.description: Describes the properties of a Machine Extension.

VirtualMachineTemplateInventoryItem.description: The Virtual machine template inventory item.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the resource.

uuid.description: Unique ID of the virtual machine template.

vmmServerId.description: ARM Id of the vmmServer resource in which this resource resides.

inventoryItemId.description: Gets or sets the inventory Item ID for the resource.

uuid.description: Unique ID of the virtual network.

vmmServerId.description: ARM Id of the vmmServer resource in which this resource resides.

fqdn.description: Fqdn is the hostname/ip of the vmmServer.

port.description: Port is the port on which the vmmServer is listening.

password.description: Credentials to use to connect to VMMServer.

username.description: Username to use to connect to VMMServer.

kind.description: Metadata used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type; e.g. ApiApps are a kind of Microsoft.Web/sites type.  If supported, the resource provider must validate and persist this value.
